brief_title: Treatment Program for Anemia in AIDS Patients
brief_summary: The objective of the Eprex (erythropoietin) Treatment Program is to provide erythropoietin for the treatment of anemia in AIDS patients.
criteria: Exclusion Criteria Co-existing Condition: Patients with the following are excluded: - Life expectancy < 3 months. - = or < grade 4 performance score. - AIDS-related dementia. - Uncontrolled hypertension. - Acute symptomatic opportunistic infection or other AIDS-defining illness.
